channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenHarmony -- OpenHarmony

item.title: CVE-2024-31078|2024-06-06T16:17:55.010Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: in OpenHarmony v4.0.0 and prior versions allow a local attacker cause service crash through NULL pointer dereference.

item.title: CVE-2024-3759|2024-05-07T06:27:19.917Z -- openharmony -- openharmony
item.description: in OpenHarmony v4.0.0 and prior versions allow a local attacker arbitrary code execution in TCB through use after free.
